issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Added std::ops to logical expressions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9988](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9988). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
So that we can write `col("a") + col("b")`
